issues.economy: particularly concerned about housing costs and quality, the absence of controlled immigration, wasteful government spending
issues.education: the pressing need to improve our schools
issues.health: the pressing need to improve our hospitals

housing.content: particularly concerned about housing costs and quality

leaflet.personalStatement: Living in Westminster and working in the City of London, as an IT professional, I share many of your concerns for this area.
leaflet.additionalNotes: I have been an active political campaigner since I was a teenager and am standing as the UKIP candidate because I believe the people of the Cities of London and Westminster deserve better representation.
